text: Robert Hossein ( 30 December 1927 - 31 December 2020) was a French movie actor, director, and writer of Iranian Робер Оссейн -Настоящая фамилия Гусейнов and UzbekRav Aaron Eliacheff: «Les racines juives de mon père, Robert Hossein, remontent à son grand-père, un certain Minkowski» origin. He directed the 1982 adaption of Les Misérables, and appeared in Vice and Virtue, Le Casse, Les Uns et les Autres and Venus Beauty Institute. Hossein died on 31 December 2020 in Essey-lès-Nancy, France from COVID-19, one day after his 93rd birthday.Robert Hossein, le géant du théâtre populaire, est mort ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in France Category:Actors from Paris Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Writers from Paris
title: Robert Hossein
